return_refund_policy.content: Customers can return items within 30 days of delivery. Items must be unused, in original packaging, and include all tags. Personal care items, consumables, and digital downloads are non-returnable. Refunds are processed within 7–10 business days after inspection.

cancellation_policy.content: Orders can be cancelled only before shipment. Once shipped or delivered, cancellation is not allowed and customers must initiate a return instead.

delivery_policy.content: Standard delivery takes 5–7 business days. Express delivery takes 3–5 business days. Orders are dispatched within 24 hours of payment confirmation. Delivery timelines may vary due to logistics or location.

return_process.content: To initiate a return, contact customer support with your order ID and reason for return. Photos may be requested. Once approved, you will receive return authorization and shipping instructions.
